name: Karlson - The Lost Milk
description:
Karlson - The Lost Milk is a fangame I made based on the game Karlson by Dani.

The current build doesn't have much. It has 6 levels and a cutscene but this is only the demo. I plan for the full-game release to have 20 levels, more mechanics and some more stuff I can't think of right now.

I do read the comments so if you have any criticism etc then just post it there.

Demo 1.0 (regular) is the regular build of the game with no fancy effects. Download this one if you have a bad PC.

Demo 1.0 (Post processing) is the exact same as the regular build but it has fancy effects in it. Download this one if you have a good PC or if you know your PC can handle it.

karlsontlm.asl is the official LiveSplit autosplitter made by me (Loomeh) and Micrologist in the Speedrun Tool Development Discord server.

Reviews:

"tfw a 13 year old can make a better/more stable game faster than a 32 year old with a terrible ego" - DylCat

"lol" - Jake The Soggy Gamer

"what is karlson" - AnthonyKun

Latest build's changelog:

Bug Fixes:

The guns no longer shrink when the player crouches.
Grappling gun rope is now black.
Grappling gun rope looks a little bit better.
*************************************************
New features:

You can no longer use Ctrl to shoot.
The Grappling gun now follows the rope when swinging.
The timer now scales to different resolutions meaning it can be seen on every resolution.

Hope you enjoy the new build!
                - Loomeh
